title: Selma To Montgomery National Historic Trail: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Fees There are no entrance fees for the Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail, including the Lowndes and Selma Interpretive Centers.    Â    America the Beautiful - National Parks and Federal Recreation Lands Pass Series Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail is a fee free unit of the National Park System and doesn't participate in the National Parks Pass Series program. For more information on this program visit the America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreation Lands Pass Series at their website http://www.nps.gov/fees_passes.htm
